entries.text: Whilst patrolling, ${unitName} stumbles across a badly deteriorated set of bones.
Upon further investigation it appears the bones have been intricately carved with infernal symbology.

options.text: Have ${unitName} secure them for further study
Have ${unitName} cleanse the bones with holy fire
Leave them, this is an ill omen

entries.text: ${unitName}: "This seems like a bad idea, but you're the boss."
${unitName}: "The world will be much better without these in it."
${unitName}: "The sooner I'm away from these foul things the better."
